description.job: I'm a junior programmer with a focus on frontend development.
description.info: If I'm not currently working on a side project, I'm in the process of starting a new one. ;)
description.status: I've completed my civil service in June, and am currently searching for a job.
description.cv: Here's my CV, if you're interested.

cv.title: Technologies I've worked with
cv.addendum: I'm {years} years old. I'm from Austria, but I know <cae>my way around English</cae>. I'm a bit interested in <ctf>IT Security</ctf> too.
cv.experience: Alongside my time in HTBLA Kaindorf (High School), I've been working with some companies like B4B Solutions, Krickl GmbH und ParcelBox Solutions.
cv.status: I have finished civil service (which is mandatory in my country) in June, and am currently available on the labour market. If you think I'm the right fit for your company, don't hesitate to message me at <mail>froehlich.alexander@pm.me</mail>.
cv.download: If you want a complete PDF with every info I can give you, you can get it <cv>here</cv>.
